ðŸ“‹ Frequently Asked Questions About Bookmark Folders for ChatGPT
Q: What is Bookmark Folders for ChatGPT?
A: Bookmark Folders is a Chrome extension that lets you bookmark important ChatGPT chats and organize them into folders for quick access.

Q: How do I create bookmark folders for ChatGPT?
A: Click the bookmark icon to create new folders and save your bookmarks. Sort your conversations by topics, projects, or any system you prefer.

Q: How do I save ChatGPT chats using Bookmark Folders?
A: Simply click the bookmark icon next to any ChatGPT conversation and choose a folder to save it in or create a new one.

Q: Is Bookmark Folders free?
A: Yes, the extension offers free basic features, allowing you to create up to 5 folders and bookmark unlimited chats.

Q: Where does Bookmark Folders store my saved chats?
A: All your bookmarked conversations are securely stored in your browser for privacy and security.

Q: Which browsers support Bookmark Folders?
A: The extension works on Google Chrome and Microsoft Edge.

Q: How do I back up my bookmarked ChatGPT conversations?
A: You can create local backups directly to your computer for safekeeping.

Q: Need help with Bookmark Folders?
A: Contact our support team at contact@bookmarkfolders.com for assistance.
